products.title: Day & Night Effortless Lime
products.productdescription: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work.

products.title: Capri Vision Paradise Green Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Capri vision paradise green day and night blind in green. Made to measure from 31.24 with free uk mainland delivery. This day and night blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Give your interior a burst of fresh colour with the capri vision paradise green day and night roller blind. Bright and cheerful, this blind will give visual appeal to your space as well as being a practical and versatile option for light control. Designed to fully close for complete privacy or alternatively, it can be semi opened to retain a sense of privacy whilst letting plenty of natural light shine through.
 
 Product id: db-vrbx1851 fabric colour: paradise green material: 100% polyester headrail: aluminium tube with steel brackets   energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Palm, Pistachio - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Palm, pistachio - day night blind a hushed yet pretty lime green blind, interjected by the convenient mesh strips of the day night range, the palm in pistachio is attractive and colourful. Use it to inject some summery vibrancy into your home, no matter w
products.productdescription: A hushed yet pretty lime green blind, interjected by the convenient mesh strips of the day night range, the palm in pistachio is attractive and colourful. Use it to inject some summery vibrancy into your home, no matter what time of year it is!Hang the pistachio against an ice white wall in your street-facing kitchen or bathroom, to ensure privacy without compromising on light. Keep the colour scheme simple with similar lime tones and plenty of white as the background colour.

products.title: Bayham, Lime - Vista Blind
products.metadescription: Bayham, lime - vista blind lime brings your decor to life with the vitality and energy that you can only get from natural colours. Add to that the gently flowing voile panelling and you have a modern piece that will allow you to add style and substance to
products.productdescription: Lime brings your decor to life with the vitality and energy that you can only get from natural colours. Add to that the gently flowing voile panelling and you have a modern piece that will allow you to add style and substance to any room in the house. Look closer and your eye will come to fully appreciate the craftsmanship behind the interplay between the voile and the lime fabric.For a room that allows you to feel full of energy and ready to embrace the day add bayham lime to the kitchen and introduce a few electric blue accessories to your worktops. Perfect for enjoying a morning coffee as you look forward to the day ahead!
